title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Borat
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and NPR's Mike Pesca discuss Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan, starring Sacha Baron Cohen. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
